rooms.title: North Of The Watchtower
rooms.description: You are just north of the watchtower. In all other directions lies the Drakwald forest.

rooms.title: The Drakwald Forest
rooms.description: In the southwest you can see the outline of the watchtower. East leads deeper into the forest.

rooms.title: A Dark Corner Of The Forest
rooms.description: The Drakwald Forest is getting thick here. The only ways are either south or west.

rooms.title: The Drakwald Forest
rooms.description: In the southwest you can see the outline of the watchtower. North leads deeper into the forest.

rooms.title: East Of The Watchtower
rooms.description: You are just east of the watchtower. In all other directions lies the Drakwald forest.

rooms.title: The Drakwald Forest
rooms.description: In the northwest you can see the outline of the watchtower. South leads deeper into the forest.

rooms.title: An Old Cart
rooms.description: An old cart is left here, but its wheels are all broken.

rooms.title: The Drakwald Forest
rooms.description: In the northwest you can see the outline of the watchtower. East leads deeper into the forest.

rooms.title: South Of The Watchtower
rooms.description: You are just south of the watchtower. In all other directions lies the Drakwald forest.

rooms.title: The Drakwald Forest
rooms.description: In the northeast you can see the outline of the watchtower. West leads to a clearing in the forest.

rooms.title: A Little Pond
rooms.description: There's a clearing in the forest here with a little pond.

rooms.title: The Drakwald Forest
rooms.description: In the northeast you can see the outline of the watchtower. South leads to a clearing in the forest.

rooms.title: West Of The Watchtower
rooms.description: You are just west of the watchtower. In all other directions lies the Drakwald Forest.

rooms.title: The Drakwald Forest
rooms.description: In the southeast you can see the outline of the watchtower. North leads deeper into the forest.

rooms.title: More Trees
rooms.description: There seem to be just more trees everywhere. You can go either east or south.

rooms.title: The Drakwald Forest
rooms.description: In the southeast you can see the outline of the watchtower. West leads deeper into the forest.
